name: OpenAI model release
title: OpenAI launches a new reasoning model for developers
body: OpenAI announced a new reasoning-focused model designed for coding and agent workflows. The company says the model performs better on multi-step tasks, tool use, and software engineering benchmarks. It will be available through the API and ChatGPT for paid users. Early partners say it reduces the need for prompt chaining and produces more stable outputs on long tasks.

name: Nvidia AI infrastructure update
title: Nvidia unveils next-generation AI chips and server platform
body: Nvidia introduced a new GPU generation and server platform aimed at training and serving large AI models faster and more efficiently. The company emphasized inference performance, lower energy cost per token, and tighter integration with existing cloud deployments. Analysts expect the launch to shape how AI startups and hyperscalers plan infrastructure upgrades this year.

name: Off-topic political story
title: Government announces new election campaign regulations
body: Officials presented new campaign and election rules ahead of the national vote. The proposal will be debated in parliament next month and has already triggered criticism from opposition groups. The announcement focused on political messaging and enforcement changes rather than technology or AI.
